overview: Not all sons love their mothers. Especially when the mother is scheming and conniving as Jacqueline (wonderfully played by Mercedes Carrera). She preys on her sweet and adorable old 'friend' (Ariella Ferrera), who has just lost her husband, and is in desperate need of finances. She'll stop at nothing, including bedding her friend's son, to get her greedy hands on their house. But sometimes, payback is a bitch!
title: Mother Exchange 4
